titles: A most true and succinct relation of the late battell neere Kineton in VVarwick-shire expressed in a letter from that godly and reverend divine Master Stephen Marshall, to his friend a worthy Member of the Honourable House of Commons.
author: Marshall, Stephen, 1594?-1655.
notes: Annotation on Thomason copy: "The latter part of ye second volume:/."; the rest is illegible.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
